entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

urls.title: Rand Paul Has More Than a Cold
urls.description: The senator from Kentucky was worried enough to get tested. But while he waited for the results, he kept going to work, the gym, and the pool.

text:
@RandPaul This from the guy who thought he may have #coronavirus, got tested, and decided to still go to work, eat in the Senate lunchroom and use the Senate gym & pool while waiting for the results. You are a clown 🤡
https://t.co/FTDEupyKBR
